title: RJBingham
text:
This is a Quarto website.
To learn more about Quarto websites visit https://quarto.org/docs/websites.

title: Pilau Rice
text:
This recipe is adapted to make slightly softer rice.

soak 300g (or 400ml) basmati rice in water for at least 30 minutes
Fry one finely chopped onion (10 minutes)
Add the following and heat for 1 minute:

1tsp ground cumin
6 cardamom pods
4 cloves
1/2 tsp ground coriander
1/2 tsp ground turmeric

Add the rice and mix
Add 550ml vegetable stock
Bring to the boil and stir
Cover and simmer for 3 minutes.
Do not remove the lid, just turn the heat off and leave it for 10 minutes (optionally, put it in the oven at 80 degrees) -Mix and leave for another 5-10 minutes, longer is ok.







Quick Tip



At the start, measure the 400ml rice out in a pyrex jug, tip it into a seive to rinse it, then use the same pyrex jug to make the 550ml of stock.





rice
